text:
Hi -
Does anyone know if  loop properties available for rss emails?

I have a design where between each item there is a dividing line.

I’d like to exclude the divider from the first item in the feed

I’ve tried the loop properties as details in hubl docs - however it seems these are not available
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/for-loops#loop-properties>

Thanks

Hey <@U01BDQN1PNW>, sorry for the delay in response here, just wanted to let you know I passed this to teams internally and they are looking into this. I will update you once I hear more :slightly_smiling_face:
